trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValueEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValueEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded" /> event or <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded" /> ou <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this delegate to implement virtual mode in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Use esse delegado para implementar o modo virtual no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle.

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o modo virtual, consulte [Como implementar o modo virtual no controle DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValueEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValueEventHandler> delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event to store updates and new entries in a data store object.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte código exemplo manipula o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> evento para armazenar as atualizações e novas entradas em um objeto de repositório de dados.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> reference topic.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> tópico de referência.
